question: What is the incidence of Oculopharyngeal Muscular Dystrophy (OPMD)?
ideal_answer: OPMD affects approximately 1 in 80,000 individuals worldwide. However, in some populations, it can affect as much as 1 in 600 individuals due to a strong founder effect.

snippets.text: Oculopharyngeal muscular dystrophy (OPMD) is a late-onset rare muscle disease affecting approximately 1 in 80,000 individuals worldwide. However, it can affect as much as 1:600 individuals in some populations due to a strong founder effect.
